MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 2:33PM in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy following reports of a snapped electricity pole. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair, and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.47PM on 23rd February 2021
